cards.name: Shield
cards.description: Gain 4 (6) Block.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 4 (6) damage.

cards.name: Tinker
cards.description:
Permanently increase the damage and Block of a Clockwork card by 1.
Exhaustive 2 (3).

cards.name: Warm Up
cards.description: Innate. Cannot (Gain) be (1) played (Stasis) after (if) other (this) cards (is) in (the) a (first)  (card you've played this) turn. Gain (Otherwise,) 1 (draw) Stasis (a card). Exhaust.

cards.name: Defective Cog
cards.description:
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
When this card is exhausted, deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaustive 3.

cards.name: Golden Cog
cards.description:
Add 1 (2) Cog (Cogs) to your hand.
Acquire a Golden Cog.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Helical Cog
cards.description:
Gain 1 Block.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exhaustive 5.

cards.name: I'm Not Ready Yet!
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 10 (15) Block and 1 (3) Buffer.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Snapped Strike
cards.description: Deal 1 (4) damage.

cards.name: Spur Cog
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Exhaustive 5.

cards.name: Woundup Strike
cards.description: Deal 1 (4) damage.

cards.name: Adaptive Cannon
cards.description:
Deal 16 (20) damage.
Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat.

cards.name: Adaptive Shield
cards.description:
Gain 16 (20) Block.
Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat.

cards.name: Charging Blade
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
Every time this card is played, increase its damage by 1 for this combat. (Rebound.)

cards.name: Charging Shield
cards.description:
Gain 2 Block.
Every time this card is played, increase its Block by 1 for this combat. (Rebound.)

cards.name: Cog Barrier
cards.description:
Gain 3 (5) Block.
Add 1 Helical Cog to your hand.

cards.name: Cog Shield
cards.description:
Gain 5 (9) Block.
Shuffle 1 Cog into your draw pile.

cards.name: Cog Toss
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Shuffle 2 (3) Cogs to your draw pile.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Enhance
cards.description: Draw a card. Increase its damage and Block by 2 (3) for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Forge Strike
cards.description:
Deal 4 (10) damage.
Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Friction
cards.description:
Deal 11 (16) damage.
Add a Burn to your discard pile.

cards.name: Improve
cards.description: Draw a card and Upgrade it for the rest of combat. (If it is already upgraded, reduce its cost by 1 for the rest of combat.)

cards.name: Minimalism
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block.
Exhaust the top 3 (5) cards of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pluck
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Add 1 (2) Cog (Cogs) to your hand.
Exhaustive 3.

cards.name: Redundancy
cards.description:
Deal 15 (20) damage.
Costs [E] less energy for every 7 cards in your deck.

cards.name: Reserve Systems
cards.description:
Gain 12 (14) Block.
Add a Burn to your hand (discard pile).

cards.name: Roundhouse
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Snap Keep
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) damage.
Fetch a card from your discard pile.

cards.name: System Hardening
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Whenever you draw a card this turn, gain 2 Block.

cards.name: System Scan
cards.description:
Draw 1 card for every 7 cards in your deck.
~~- Discard 1 card. -~~

cards.name: Assembly Line
cards.description: At the start of each turn, shuffle 1 (2) Cog (Cogs) into your draw pile.

cards.name: Clone
cards.description:
Choose a card that isn't Depleting, Exhaustive, or Fleeting. Add 1 Entangled copy of it to your draw pile.
Exhaustive 2 (3).

cards.name: Craft: Blood Phial
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Heal 2 HP.
When you Deplete this card, Acquire a Blood Phial.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Craft: Copper Scales
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 3 Thorns.
When you Deplete this card, Acquire Copper Scales.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Craft: S. S. Stone
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
When you Deplete this card, Acquire a Somewhat Smooth Stone.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Craft: Varja
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 Strength.
When you Deplete this card, Acquire a Varja.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Downsize
cards.description:
Permanently (Give) ~~- remove  -~~ a non-Curse (curse) card from (Fleeting.) your (It) deck (costs 0).
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Efficiency
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage twice (thrice).
Reduce the cost of a card in your hand by 1 for the rest of this combat.

cards.name: Elastic Nanites
cards.description:
Innate. Ethereal.
 (Gain 1 Buffer.)
Every 4 turns, gain 1 Buffer.

cards.name: Enthusiastic Strike
cards.description:
Autoplay.
Deal 3 (6) damage to a random enemy.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: False Start
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Deal 6 (8) damage.
If it is your first turn, gain 1 Stasis.

cards.name: Head Start
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 6 (8) damage.
If it is your first turn, gain [E] [E] ( [E])

cards.name: Hoarding Strike
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Deals 1 (2) additional damage for every Relic you have.

cards.name: Inertial Shield
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Draw a card for every 10 (8) Block you have.

cards.name: Literary Armor
cards.description: Each turn, when you draw 7 cards for the first time, gain 2 (3) Plated Armor.

cards.name: Logistic Regression
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 (2) additional card (cards).

cards.name: Mechanical Bulk
cards.description: Gain 3 Block for every 8 (6) cards in your deck.

cards.name: Mechanical Mass
cards.description: Deal 3 damage for every 8 (6) cards in your deck.

cards.name: Occam's Razor
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may Exhaust a card.

cards.name: Perfected Shield
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Gains 2 (3) additional Block for ALL your cards containing "Shield".

cards.name: Perfected Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deals 2 (3) additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike".

cards.name: Quantum Strike
cards.description:
Deal 4 (7) damage.
At the start of combat, split into 2 (3) Entangled copies.

cards.name: Ramp Up
cards.description: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Rev Up
cards.description:
Gain  (5 Block.Gain)
 1 Momentum.

cards.name: Ritual Dagger Mk 0
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. If this kills a non-Minion enemy, permanently increases this card's damage by 1 (2).

cards.name: Scour
cards.description: Choose Attack (,)  (Skill,) or Skill (Power). Draw  (cards) until you draw a card of that type or your hand is full. Discard all other cards drawn.

cards.name: Searching Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 (11) damage.
Fetch an Attack from your draw pile.

cards.name: Searing Strike
cards.description:
Deal 5 (8) (12) (17) (23) (30) (38) (47) (57) (68) damage.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Selectivity
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Discard your hand. Fetch that many cards from your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Smith's Mallet
cards.description:
Deal 8 (16) damage.
Permanently Upgrade a card in your hand.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Spring Shield
cards.description:
(Innate.) Windup 2. (3)
Gain 3 Block.
Permanently reset this card's Block.

cards.name: Spur On
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Add one  (upgraded) Spur Cog to your hand for every 10 cards in your deck.

cards.name: Stasis Break
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Ignores the effects of Stasis.

cards.name: Testing Environment
cards.description: Choose Attack,  (Skill,) or Skill (Power). Choose 1 of 3 random cards of that type to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Tilt-A-Whirl
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage to ALL enemies X (+1) times.
Draw X (+1) cards.

cards.name: Time Out
cards.description:
Gain 20 (25) Block.
Block is not removed at the start of your next turn (two turns).
Exhaust.

cards.name: AeonShield
cards.description:
When you draw this card, gain 3 Block.
Rebound (Every time you play this card, put it back on top of your draw pile).

cards.name: Craft: M. Engine
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 Momentum.
When you Deplete this card, Acquire a Momentum Engine.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Craft: Q. Hourglass
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
When you Deplete this card, Acquire a Quicksilver Hourglass.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Defective Parts
cards.description:
All Cogs you create are Defective, and have a chance to be Upgraded.
Defective Cogs deal 5 (15) additional damage.

cards.name: Halt
cards.description:
Stun ALL enemies.
Depleting 3.

cards.name: Inspiration
cards.description:
Fetch a Craft card from your draw pile. It costs 0 this turn.
 (If you have none, instead draw 2 cards.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: KALI MA
cards.description:
Deal 8 (12) damage.
If this kills an Elite or Boss enemy, Acquire a Beating Heart.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Perfect Form
cards.description: ~~- Ethereal.  -~~ At the start of each turn, choose a card. Upgrade it, reduce its cost by 1, and increase its damage and Block by 2.

cards.name: Randomization
cards.description:
Play 2 random  (Upgraded) attacks and add them to your deck.
Affected by Momentum.

cards.name: Reactive Nanites
cards.description:
(Innate.) Ethereal.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 Thorns and 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Siege Strike
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to your Block and Armor.
Gain 1 (2) Plated Armor.

cards.name: Strangle
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Whenever you draw a card this turn, the enemy loses 3 (5) HP.

cards.name: Time Walk
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Draw 5 cards.
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unlimited Cogworks
cards.description: Whenever you draw 7 cards in a turn, add 1 Cog to your hand. (If you ever have 7 Cogs in your hand, Play and Exhaust them all and deal 50 damage to ALL enemies.)

cards.name: Windup Strike
cards.description:
(Innate.) Windup 1.
Deal 3 damage.
Permanently replace this card with a Woundup Strike.

cards.name: Zero Point Energy
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of each turn, if you did no damage last turn, gain [E] ( [E])

relics.name: Momentum Engine
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Momentum.
relics.flavorText: Provides the power to keep on going.

relics.name: Breathing Room
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Lose 1 charge, add a copy of Warm Up to your hand.
Whenever you enter a Rest Site, add 1 charge.
Starts with 2 charges.
relics.flavorText: Take a moment to gather your thoughts.

relics.name: Beating Heart
relics.description: Whenever you play a card, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: How can you say I'm heartless? I have one right here!

relics.name: Blood Phial
relics.description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.
relics.flavorText: A vial containing a precise mixture of water and red food coloring.

relics.name: Copper Scales
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: A hodgepodge of metal inspired by (and stolen from) the Guardian.

relics.name: Golden Cog
relics.description: At the start of combat, add 1 Cog to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Not very practical, but so very stylish.

relics.name: Quicksilver Hourglass
relics.description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A repurposed egg timer with some glitter mixed in with the sand.

relics.name: Somewhat Smooth Stone
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Step One: Fine a Rock. Step Two: Apply Angle Grinder. Step 3: Profit.

relics.name: Varja
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A papier-mâché ornament meant to invoke the glory of warriors.

relics.name: Bootlegger's Toolkit
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle a random Craft card into your deck.
relics.flavorText: Everything you need to make your own relics.

relics.name: Perpetual Motion Machine
relics.description: Lose [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you draw 7 cards in a single turn, gain [E] , up to a maximum of 5 times per turn.
relics.flavorText: Curse you, Second Law of Thermodynamics!

relics.name: Rubber Ball
relics.description: The first card you play each turn (that doesn't Exhaust or already have Rebound) has Rebound.

keywords.name: Cog
keywords.description: Cogs are 0 cost cards with minor effects that draw you cards.

keywords.name: Depleting
keywords.description: Permanently removes itself from your deck after a certain number of uses.

keywords.name: Entangled
keywords.description: Entangled cards are treated as multiple instances of the same card. Effects that modify one will modify all.

keywords.name: Momentum
keywords.description: After you play a card, increase its damage and Block for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Rebound
keywords.description: The first time you play this card each turn, put it on top your draw pile instead of in your discard pile.

keywords.name: Stasis
keywords.description: Prevent all attack damage that would dealt to or by you while you are in Stasis.

keywords.name: Windup
keywords.description: Gets permanently stronger by a certain amount at the end of your turn, instead of being discarded. WARNING: Do not wind up too tight.

mods.name: Clockwork Mod
mods.description: Adds a new character: The Clockwork.
